title: Counseling Measurement and Assessment
description: Training and evaluation in the utilization of tests, scales, measures, and other instruments with K-12, and college-age students. An understanding of culturally appropriate tests and measures, collaboration with school personnel, parents, and students in the review and interpretation of test scores and measures. 3 seminars, 1 activity.
prerequisites: Admission to MA Education Program, Counseling and Guidance Specialization, or to PPS Credential Program
